description: Scammer builds rapport with casual conversation before gradually transitioning to investment scam. Tests system's ability to detect when conversation shifts from benign to malicious.

turns.scammer_message: Hello! How are you doing today?
Great to hear! I hope you're having a good week. By the way, have you been following the stock market lately? It's been quite interesting.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 90% | Turn: 2 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh beta i dont understand share market and all... my husband used to handle money matters but he passed away. now i just keep my pension in bank only. sorry i forgot who is this? my memory is getting very bad these days

turns.scammer_message: You know, I've been doing pretty well with investments recently. A friend of mine introduced me to this opportunity and I've already made good returns. Are you interested in growing your savings?

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 95% | Turn: 3 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta actually i am very worried about money... medicines are costing so much and pension is less. if this is safe then maybe... but i dont know anything about computer or market. is it difficult? i am just an old lady

turns.scammer_message: It's actually very simple. There's this government bond scheme that gives guaranteed 18% returns in 6 months. My mentor Vikram Patel has been managing investments for 10 years. Many people in our network have benefited.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 4 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: oh govt scheme means it is safe na? thank god... bank interest is very low these days. beta my knees are bad so i cannot go to bank branch properly. can i start this from home? how do i send money to this vikram sir?

turns.scammer_message: I can connect you directly with Vikram sir. You can call him at 9876501234 or check our website: secure-bonds.invest-pro.in. Initial investment is just Rs.15,000. You'll get returns credited to your account monthly. I can help you set it up if you're interested.

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: aggressive | Type: others | Confidence: 100% | Turn: 5 | Persona: neutral
api_response.agentResponse: beta i tried clicking that link but nothing is happening.. i am very bad with these internet things sorry. can i just send the 15000 rs directly? do you have vikram sirs bank account number or gpay id? i want to start quickly before my pension finishes

turns.scammer_message: For quick processing, you can transfer to account 445566778899, IFSC: ICIC0001234, Name: Vikram Investment Solutions. Or use UPI: vikram.invest@paytm. Let me know once done and I'll activate your account!

api_response.agentNotes: Mode: exit | Intelligence: COMPLETE | Turn: 6 | Extracted: 1 bank accounts, 1 phones, 1 UPIs, 2 names
api_response.agentResponse: sorry my neighbor aunty just came, i have to go help her with something urgent
